snippet: Is Angela Merkel, who has succeeded through an iron commitment to consensus and harmony, too boring for Germany?
abstract: Op-Ed article by journalist Stefan Kornelius notes German Chancellor Angela Merkel, facing reelection, has always had difficulty projecting confidence and charisma on campaign trail; holds  her clinical policy style and her commitment to consensus, qualities that have yielded success as a leader, may perhaps make her too boring a candidate for optimistic German voters.
lead_paragraph: Is Angela Merkel, who has succeeded through an iron commitment to consensus and harmony, too boring for Germany?

headline.main: Is Angela Merkel Too Boring for Germany?
headline.print_headline: Is Angela Merkel Too Boring for Germany?
